forecastday.title: Thursday

forecastday.title: Monday

forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers and windy conditions developing in the afternoon. High 53F. Winds SW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.
